topicTitle: Kipp (iDerp, Hitman, Chocolate Rain) Moderator Application

posts.postText:
1) What position are you applying for? Moderator.

2) How old are you? (if you prefer to say this in private, just ask): REDACTED

3) Where do you live? (Country, time zone): UK, GMT 

4) Current In-Game Name: Kipp (was iDerp, Hitman, Chocolate Rain)

5) Steam ID & Link to your Steam Community page: STEAM_0:0:28205900 and http://steamcommunity.com/id/jboydarocket

6) Email Address: REDACTED@REDACTED

7) How long have you been involved (frequent player, moderator, donator, admin) with [NNJG] or Shadow's TTT/Flood/Jail/ server: I have been a VIP in the Jailbreak server. Great server to play on!

8) What you can bring to the [NNJG] Team (Web/Graphic Design, Lua/other Coder, Moderation, Map Maker, ect.)?: Moderation in TTT : Well, I run my own server, I can't code, I can make maps. I have made 3 jail maps... I can mod very well as I have my own server.

9) Why do you want to be part of the [NNJG]Team?: I have been in NNJG for over 3 months. I really like the clan and I feel like I want to play more.

10 ) Any GMOD/TF2/CSS experience: Gmod : 442.3 Hours TF2 : 189.9 hours CS:S 32.9 Hours. So I'll say i'm skilled.

11) Have you ever owned a GMOD/TF2/CSS server?: Yes! It's a CSS jailbreak server.

12) Do you have a microphone? Do you frequently use it?: I'm afraid not. I will hope to be getting one soon though.

13) Any other Comments or information you can provide: Well, I am very friendly. I like to play with my friends on this server, and NNJG is probably the most involved clan i've been with! 

Cheers

Bird Flu :3 http://img33.imageshack.us/i/recc1h.png/
Squares (VIP on Flood) http://img849.imageshack.us/i/recc2.png/

I have NEVER EVER seen a guy named Noname on any of the NNJG servers, he doesn't have 25 posts or even 1 reccomendation and thats my argument.
-Support

Well, I have more friends online now, that was when only like 2 of my friends were online.

Read this. 
http://nonerdsjustgeeks.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=16&t=2117
I have read that, but please try to get recommendations from people actually from NNJG. Kthxbai

This is my main problem with this application.

1. I've seen picture b4. But yeah... nvr really seen you i think?
 2. Are you running for Moderator in TTT? or Moderator in Jail?
If Moderator in TTT. I ask for immediate denial, cause I have never or rarely seen you on TTT.
If Moderator in Jail. Good Luck. I have no opinions since I dont play Jail. 
3. Okay, you can mod your own server. However, we don't know how exactly you mod your own server. Once again, if its not a TTT, then Bird Flu and other people will give a better support/denial.

2. I'm applying for moderator in jailbreak. I've been there for a fairly long time but i've not been active in the past week due to computer crashes.
3. Well, I run a Jailbreak server for CS:S, and a darkRP server for garrysmod. I moderate on garrysmod using ULX, what NNJG uses. And on cs:s I use sourcemod.
Do you perhaps have a sample photo of a map you've made? I'm sincerely interested.

I've just started making jailbreak maps. It's only a small map, but that's good for when there is not much people on the server. I will probably make some better ones when I improve! This was my... second map?
 map 1.png 
 map 2.png

If you want the bsp file (the actual map itself) just send me a message. Too much attachments so I can't show the screenshot of lé armory. Thanks for your interest  :D
